ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup instant nonfat dry milk powder, or more to taste

cookingTips: Heat milk to 110°F before adding kefir starter to activate cultures properly
Keep mixture undisturbed in a warm environment (yogurt maker or oven with light on) for 12-24 hours
Stir in dry milk powder for thicker yogurt and additional protein content
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you flavor this homemade yogurt—with honey, vanilla, or fresh fruit—to create different varieties?
